732444f-a.title: Occupations - Peddlers - Miscellaneous - Dry goods - Food.
732444f-a.text:

707521f-a.text:
First Avenue, north from 13th Street, from and including the N.W. corner; the view is spoiled to a great extent by the Second Avenue Elevated line overhead, with the express station at 14th Street.

May 19, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
